tweet_text: @gofilly My grandfather taught me the importance of being prompt. If you tell me to be somewhere, I will be there 10 minutes early. I have always been like that. As I get older, the more I take issue with people, both friends and business associates, who are chronically late.
text_en: My grandfather taught me the importance of being prompt. If you tell me to be somewhere, I will be there minutes early. I have always been like that. As I get older, the more I take issue with people, both friends and business associates, who are chronically late.
